channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Am I eligible for the Chase Sapphire Reserve's 100,000-point bonus?
item.description: The popular Chase Sapphire Reserve has recently seen major changes including a new welcome offer. Before you apply, let's make sure you're bonus eligi...

item.title: Earn rewards with Chase’s Refer-A-Friend program
item.description: Chase card referral bonuses can be a great way to earn bonus rewards without making a purchase. Here's what to know about Chase Refer-A-Friend.

item.title: Is it worth buying up to American Airlines' new business-class Flagship Suite Preferred?

item.title: You can bid on full hotel buyouts, couples trips and more as World of Hyatt celebrates Bunkhouse integration
item.description: World of Hyatt is celebrating more Bunkhouse Hotels properties integrating into the program with one-of-a-kind Find experiences.

item.title: During Italy’s ‘Jubilee’, here’s why you want to go to Calabria instead of Rome, Venice or Milan
